Fashionably Yours - NOW SELLING
-
Vogue is perfect for the first home buyer, the downsizer or the commuter.
-
34 Perfect Building Allotments.
-
Opposite Lansell Square Shopping Complex, just down the road from the Rocklea
Complex and close to Primary Schools, Secondary Colleges and Kindergartens.
-
Nearby Medical Facilites include Healthworks and several pharmacies, and of course, just
a quick right hand turn to head down the Calder Highway to Melbourne.

-
Titles available.

Description:
Beautifully Presented in Convenient Location
Youll instantly feel at home when you enter this comfortable and tastefully presented residence, which offers affordability, convenient living, plus many other qualities that appeal to a variety of buyers in the market.
Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms with two including BIRs, updated kitchen/meals area, light filled lounge, plus separate bathroom and laundry facilities.
Spacious allotment approx 640m2 in size offers easy vehicle access for those looking to set up a workshop, or store a caravan, trailer or boat.
Undercover outdoor area is perfect for those who want to relax at the end of a long day, or invite some friends/family over for a BBQ, with abundant space over the established backyard for kids and pets to enjoy.
Youll be kept comfortable all year round with a gas heater on hand, along with a split system heating/cooling unit.
Situated only a few minutes walk to the outstanding new Kangaroo Flat leisure/acquatic centre, with schools, train station, medical, and shopping facilities also within very close proximity. Kangaroo Flat is a thriving suburb with exceptional facilities, and this property is sure to be a quality proposition for investors, or an appealing residence for the owner occupiers.
Inspection by appointment please contact Bawa on 0402 206 745.

Description:
Light-filled Entertainer's Home
Minutes' walk to Lansell Square, Bunnings and so many other amenities is this perfectly positioned home in a quiet cul-de-sac court.
Freshly presented, the attraction the home offers from the front of the street is all complimented with the features and benefits it has inside.
Offering 3 large bedrooms, with the main having an ensuite and walk-in robe.
The light-filled open-plan kitchen/meals/lounge area overlooks the stunning design of the spacious undercover merbau deck area that is partially re-turned.
The extra multipurpose room can be utilised as you see fit. Heating and cooling is provided for year-round comfort.
Outside oozes carefree living, with low-maintenance sizeable yard, double garage with remote access and landscaped gardens.
On the Melbourne side of the Calder, start enquiring today.

Description:
Walking distance to popular, central Kangaroo Flat
This well-planned and well-loved home has been with the same family for many years, providing privacy and quiet living in central Kangaroo Flat.
The home features 4 bedrooms, main with ensuite, walk-in robe and built-in robe, 2 others with built-in robes, and the fourth with a free-standing robe.
The living areas are in a large open plan environment, and include a spacious formal lounge and dining area with study nook, and a family room which leads outside onto an undercover decked BBQ/alfresco area.
The renovated kitchen with adjacent meals area is well-planned and appointed, having plenty of bench space, cupboard storage and dishwasher.
The renovated laundry also has plenty of bench and cupboard space, plus there is ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating throughout.
Outside is a colourbond shed with concrete floor, a garden shed and a play area for the children.
There are also solar panels on the roof to save on those power bills, and room for the trailer, boat or caravan if need be.
This fantastic property has all the features to make living very comfortable.
A popular hot-spot location within walking distance to shops, schools, Kangaroo Flat CBD, walking tracks, parks and public transport.
Inspect now and invest in the future.

Description:
Private and Peaceful
Positioned within walking distance to central Kangaroo Flat, Rotary Park Lake, Gurri Wanyarra Aquatic Centre and bushland reserves. This property is certainly conveniently located to all amenities and still only a short drive to Bendigo CBD.
The property features include:
Cladded weatherboard home with three spacious bedrooms.
Large open living area with gas log fire, mantel piece and polished timber floors.
Kitchen with gas oven and cooktop.
Updated central bathroom with spa bath, shower and large vanity unit.
Separate toilet located off the spacious laundry.
Outside you will discover a peaceful rear deck overlooking a lush native garden, BBQ and entertaining area, ample amounts of shedding and carport space to accommodate up to 4 cars.
This property is not to be missed, call now for more information or to arrange an inspection.

Description:
SOMETHING FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY
This fantastic family home ticks all the boxes! Combining modern styling with quality fittings and finishes throughout, including Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, porcelain tiles, high ceilings and an exceptional and spacious enclosed entertaining area with built in bar and feature fire place.
Comprising 4 bedrooms plus study, 3 bathrooms and large lounge room, with 3.2 kilowatt solar system to help with the power bills, all set on 731sqm with side access to the 9m x 6m shed, this home has it all! If you are looking for the complete package - something to keep mum, dad & the children happy - don't look past this exceptional offering!
Conveniently located with Kangaroo Flat Primary School and Crusoe College within walking distance for the kids and only minutes from Kangaroo Flat shopping, swimming pool, sporting facilities and bushland reserves.
Currently let until 29th August 2019, with option to purchase with tenants in place, or purchase now with vacant possession available upon tenant vacating.

Description:
Light Filled Luxury on the Lake
On entering this home, you get glimpses of what awaits you. Cleverly designed to maximize views of the lake there is a real sense of peace and tranquility. Imagine recreational fishing and then relaxing back and enjoying your domain.
Life on the lake in this quality large family home could be your new reality. This home presents beautifully with nothing to be done. Move in and enjoy!
Inside Feature:
Large main bedroom with walk-through walk-in robe, extra-large ensuite & water views
Two separate living areas flowing directly onto a timber decked undercover entertaining area
Built in robes to the other 3 bedrooms
Picture windows from family room taking in exquisite views
Chefs kitchen with island bench in the hub of the home
Ducted gas heating
Ducted evaporative cooling
Quality window furnishings throughout
Outside Features:
Extra-large double garage with rear access
5000lt underground rainwater tank to service rear irrigation
Gate access to walking track around lake (which is regularly stocked with trout and red fin)
North facing allowing an abundance of natural light to filter in
Quality landscaping and secure fencing
Entertaining is a dream with this beautifully appointed house in a position envied by many and enjoyed by few.

Description:
Renovated cream brick on Melbourne side
Cream brick homes have a great reputation for being quality built and this one is no different but add to that a nicely renovated interior and you're bound to be impressed.
As well as being ideal for a large portion of buyers, this property could also be well suited to being doctors consultation rooms, a medical clinic, a dental practice or another business that could make use of the high profile location on the Melbourne side of Bendigo and the backyard for parking space.
Features include:
- Polished hardwood floors in the living area combined with crisp white walls and a few remaining features of the original home such as 9' ceilings and beautiful cornices.
- An open plan kitchen, dining and living space ideal for family living.
- An attractive modern kitchen complete with a 600mm stainless steel oven, electric cook top and dishwasher.
- The main bedroom has a built-in robe. All three bedrooms can accommodate a queen bed ensemble.
- The main bathroom is also new. Fresh and stylish with floor to ceiling tiled walls. Comprised of shower, vanity, bath and toilet.
- Climate control is catered for by way of ducted gas heating and a Weatherall cooling unit.
- A single brick garage with remote roller door access. At the rear of the garage is a separate toilet and a workshop.
- A secure backyard is safe for children to play in as well as for pets.
- The allotment is approximately 736m2 in total and very low maintenance.
Not only are we on the Melbourne side of Bendigo but within walking distance of Lansell Square shopping centre and public transport and only a short drive to schools, medical facilities, the Kangaroo Flat train station and the newly completed Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre.
Estimated rental per week: $320.

Description:
IMMACULATELY PRESENTED & WITH FOREST LAKE VIEWS!!
This modern three-bedroom home is in excellent order throughout and ideal for first home buyers, singles, couples, families, downsizers, retiree's or investors after a low maintenance property. Conveniently located, with shops, schools, transport, sporting facilities all close by and the CBD of Bendigo an easy 10-minute drive away. You will love it here as Forest Lake or nearby bushland are great for taking a leisurely stroll or to walk the dog.
The home comprises of three bedrooms, master with his & hers built in robes and access to the two-way bathroom which has shower, bath, vanity and toilet. The other two bedrooms have built in robes and are located towards the rear of the home. The light & bright kitchen has stainless steel electric oven, gas cooktop & dishwasher with plenty of cupboards, pot drawers & bench space. The adjacent dining and living space have a glass sliding door that leads to the outdoors. There is a second living area located towards the front of the home and is the perfect spot for a lounge and TV. Other internal features are laundry with storage cupboards, a second separate toilet plus ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling that control the climate throughout the year.
The alfresco is very private and a great place to enjoy a BBQ or just to relax and unwind with views of Forest Lake. Notable external features are 6 solar panels that help reduce the power bills, a water tank with pump that supplies water to the toilets and secure fencing.
For the car accommodation, there is a double garage with auto door and internal access.
Previously let at $300 per week but now vacant and available for immediate possession.
It all adds up to an impressive package and is sure to attract a number of buyers.
Call today to arrange an inspection and avoid missing this great opportunity.

Description:
Near Parks, Shops and Schools
An impressive, well maintained townhouse that will tick all the boxes. Perfect for retirees or professionals, purposefully set up to be locked up and left.
Open plan living areas, spacious bedrooms with built-in robes, plenty of storage, split system heating and cooling, single lock up garage with auto roller door, close to shops and public transport. What more do you need? Situated across from the Kangaroo Flat Bowls Club, this property would make a perfect first home or is ideal for busy professionals or the astute investor. Those seeking to get a foothold into this fantastic location will need to be quick to secure this home.
Features include:
- 2 bedrooms with built-in robes
- Vinyl plank flooring to kitchen dining area
- Reverse cycle air-conditioning
- Ceiling fan in master bedroom
- 3.5m x 6.0m garage with auto roller door
- Easy access to public transport linking you to all the necessities
This is a truly special opportunity to secure a great property just minutes to everything.

Description:
Modern and Trendy
As the residents of Lowe Street, Kangaroo Flat know, there is not too many places with the tranquil amenity that nature brings to this wonderful street.
This charming 2 bedroom recycled red-brick veneer home is just 5 years old and tucked away behind a beautiful low maintenance garden with crushed brick footpaths and situated just 5 minutes from the Kangaroo Flat CBD.
From the moment you enter the home into the open plan kitchen and living area you can see just how well this home has been thought out, with feature lighting, beautiful large windows which capture lots of natural light and tiles throughout.
The kitchen features a dishwasher, stainless steel oven and gas cooktop, a pantry, tonnes of cupboards for storage and the perfect amount bench space to prepare the family dinner.
The beautiful bathroom services both bedrooms and again has plenty of bench and cupboard space. Both bedrooms have built in robes and are of good size.
Through the sliding glass door off the main living space is a wonderful paved courtyard area to enjoy the peace of the outdoors, it is fully fenced in to keep your outdoor pet and also features a low maintenance garden.
The drive to Melbourne is made easy being under 1 hr and 40 minutes or catch the Kangaroo Flat train direct. If you feel like staying close by though just jump on the nearby public transport or walk to enjoy all the amenities Kangaroo Flat has to offer including the CBD shops, Lansell Square and entertainment and sports facilities.
If you are a retiree, downsizer, first home owner, or investor this property is an opportunity not to be missed.
Call Brett Thompson at Sky Rocket Property today to book an inspection.

Address: 323 MacKenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Immaculate inside & out
From the moment you look at this home you will notice the presentation from inside and out into the beautiful gardens and realise that you have nothing to do but move in and enjoy. The front living space greets you with plenty of natural light but also the privacy of modern double roller blinds that serve a multitude of purposes ( the blinds, ceiling fans & ducted evaporative cooling are consistent through the home ), an almost new gas wall heater also warms both the living space and into the kitchen.
The light and bright kitchen overlooks the garden from the sink, has loads of storage and stainless steel appliances, the adjoining dining space has the benefit of a solar tube light to enhance the space even further. Comprising three bedrooms all with built in robes, ceiling fans and quality blinds this home would make the perfect first home, down sizer or investment so it will suit a multitude of buyers.
The back yard is a place to relax with a paved undercover outdoor area overlooking the private gardens and many spots to sit and enjoy a quiet cuppa, and there are several garden sheds that could be used for potting sheds, a chook or dog run and storage.
The suburb of Kangaroo Flat is becoming more popular with its proximity to the Highway, shops, fitness centres and medical facilities. Call today to inspect this impressive property.

Description:
A FABULOUS INVESTMENT CURRENTLY TENANTED!
Located only a few minutes from all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat including supermarkets and schools, this flexible property is positioned in a quiet street with a bus stop just around the corner. A neat established garden at the front of the property includes a wide driveway to a double carport, which allows for plenty of off-street parking.
The main property is a solid brick, three-bedroom home. All bedrooms have built-in robes and the master enjoys a ceiling fan and neat ensuite. The main living space is directly off the front entry, and its L-shape ensures the room has plenty of natural light and allows for flexibility of use. The kitchen and dining room is accessible via the living room and the main hallway and also off the hall is a family bathroom, linen closet, separate toilet and a door to the side of the house.
Outdoors, the side of the main house includes an enclosed fernery and out the back is a large lawn area, a fantastic undercover alfresco space ideal for outdoor meals, and shedding.
Also on the allotment is a separate, fully self-contained unit. This great little flat offers a private entrance leading up a ramp to the front door. Indoors is an open plan lounge, kitchen and dining room with great storage. A single bedroom features a walk-in robe and the bathroom includes a large shower. The unit has access to the main garden, but also enjoys a private garden and water tank on the other side.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating in main house
Four-burner gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher
Access from both sides of the property into the rear garden
Spacious backyard
Single garage and work shed in backyard
Water tank x 2
Separate fully self-contained unit
With two practical properties on the one allotment, this is a fantastic investment opportunity, particularly given that currently the two homes service satisfied, quality tenants on a periodic lease with a return of $430 per week combined rent. Located in a quiet street yet still close to the highway and amenities of Kangaroo Flat, the property is also walking distance to medical practitioners and within easy access of bus stops.
